description: Vadim Black and his father make their way to Barcelona to visit Allen King and his dad. The two sons can barely make it up the stairs and away from their fathers before their passionate lovemaking begins—even though Allen’s girlfriend has yet to leave the house. Distance has grown their desire to a fever pitch—Vadim works Allen’s shaft and hole with his hungry mouth before taking the plunge into the sexy Spaniard’s ass.
title: Son Swap Part 7
